nodes.text: Yandel Roe was a male Human who served as an officer in the army of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war he worked as a weapon modifications merchant on the planet Corellia where he ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport. Yandel Roe had brown hair, blue eyes and fair skin. While at his stall he wore a white and blue uniform.

Yandel Roe appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Corellia. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Yandel Roe was removed from the game along with the rest of the Modification Commendations Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
